saying: All a plant needs is love...and sun and water and soil.
description: Maggie is a pig villager from the Animal Crossing series with a normal personality. She originally appeared in Doubutsu no Mori e+ as one of six starter villagers bundled with the game, alongside Walker, Rod, Merry, Angus, and Willow, respectively. Maggie would eventually return in Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo after over a decade of absence, and later appeared again in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.
